mentions.candidate: Gareth Hughes was born in Wrexham and grew up here. He attended St. David's School and Yale College, then Cardiff University before being called to the Bar.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born in Wrexham, raised in Wrexham, educated in Wrexham. Now make him Wrexham's M.P.

politicalExperience.achievements: His interests include the British Comedy Society, a charitable organisation which in the past ten years has raised over Â£250,000 for charity.

images.caption: Gareth Hughes, Welsh Conservative candidate for Wrexham.
